Uses of Package
fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.externprog

Packages that use fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.externprog
fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.externprog   
fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.testing   
 

Classes in fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.externprog used by fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.externprog
ExternalProgram
          Used to launch an external application in a rather safe, efficient and convenient way: streams are processed in different threads (which use buffering through the Channels methods - unless I'm wrong !)
ExternalProgramException
          Simple exception class for classes related to ExternalProgram.
ReaderConsumer
          The threads controlling stdout and stderr streams call ReaderConsumer.consumeReader(Reader) after initalizing the text decoder (the Reader object) connected to the stream.
ToWriterReaderConsumer
          This ReaderConsumer object writes an output stream to a generic Writer object.
WriterFeeder
          The thread controlling stdin steam calls WriterFeeder.feedWriter(Writer) after initializing the text encoder (the Writer object) connected to this stream.
 

Classes in fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.externprog used by fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.testing
ExternalProgramException
          Simple exception class for classes related to ExternalProgram.
ReaderConsumer
          The threads controlling stdout and stderr streams call ReaderConsumer.consumeReader(Reader) after initalizing the text decoder (the Reader object) connected to the stream.
